content: infuse your home with a touch of feline charm with this adorable crochet basket worked in the round using lily sugar n cream this easy pattern will teach you single_crochet and appliqué techniques measuring 10 x 8 finish off your basket with unique cat features to give it a personal touch display it as a playful organizer for anything from cozy throws to crafting supplies and more materials lily® sugar n cream™ 2 5 oz/70 9 g 120 yds/109 m contrast a tangerine 01699 6 balls or 634 yds/580 m contrast b black 00002 1 ball or 21 yds/19 m contrast c white 00001 1 ball or 12 yds/11 m measurements approx 10 25 5 cm diameter x 8 20 5 cm tall
